name: tecnoleads-v1
description: Sistema de importación SECOP II a Odoo CRM

scripts.install:all: npm run install:backend && npm run install:frontend && npm run install:electron
scripts.build: cd frontend && npm install && npm run build
scripts.build:electron: npm run build:frontend && cd electron && npm install && npm run build
scripts.start: cd backend && npm install && npm start

author: Tecnophone
